name: CDC The Game
description:
CDC is a game about stopping the transmission of an epidemic across the US. You are the CDC commander and must place limited resources to stop the spread of the virus. The game is a top-down Virtual Board Game. The way you play is by selecting a discovery character after placing a few click research, this will advance the turn and allow the virus to spread unless you found it! If you find the virus, make sure to send out a vaccine agent to clear it! You must stop the virus from spreading before it takes over 50% of the US. Currently the resource system isn't functional, so you are free to put down as many people as you want, to make it fun try to limit yourself to 3 moves a turn! Also, as soon as you make a space immune it will say you have won. However, the virus is still spreading, and you can keep playing. Thanks!

Global Game Jam 2017
